alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 11:12PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Franklin, southern Crawford and northern Sebastian Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1112 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles southeast of Van Buren, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and dime to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Mountainburg... Alma... Barling... Lavaca... Mulberry... Dyer... Rudy... Kibler... Central City... Concord... Shibley... Cecil... Furry... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 5 and 24. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 8. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for northwestern and west central Arkansas.
